sessions.title: Kickstart with React: Personal Intro
sessions.summary: Tailored guidance for total beginners in React.
sessions.description:
Starting with React can be daunting.

Yet, with the right guidance, it can be an exhilarating journey.

In this session, we will begin by demystifying React's core philosophy.

Why was React created?

What problems does it solve in the world of web development?

Together, we'll delve into the virtual DOM, JSX, and component-based architecture.

No need to worry about the jargon; I'll break everything down step by step.

We'll touch on the importance of unidirectional data flow and the component lifecycle.

We'll set up a new React project together.

By the end of our session, you will have a clear understanding and a roadmap tailored just for you, to aid your React journey.

sessions.title: Debugging Your React Code
sessions.summary: Stuck with a React bug? Let's squash it together.
sessions.description:
Every developer, regardless of experience, encounters bugs.

But, the power lies in knowing how to squash them effectively.

In our focused session, you'll learn the art of debugging in React.

We'll start by understanding the common pitfalls and errors that many developers face.

Using tools like React DevTools, we'll inspect components, props, and state.

Together, we'll simulate a few bugs and then debug them in real-time.

You'll learn about error boundaries and their significance in preventing app crashes.

By the end, not only will we have tackled your current bug(s), but you'll also be equipped with a toolkit of debugging strategies for future challenges.

Remember, in the world of development, debugging is a superpower.

sessions.title: Effective State Management Tactics
sessions.description: Discuss your app's state challenges and explore different strategies, from `useState` to `useReducer` or even Redux, to manage state.

sessions.title: Custom Hooks Creation
sessions.description: Explore the power of custom hooks. Work together to create hooks tailored for your application's needs.

sessions.title: Styling Strategies in React
sessions.description: From CSS modules to styled-components, discuss the pros and cons of different styling approaches in React and implement the best fit for your project.

sessions.title: API Integration and Data Fetching
sessions.summary: Fetch, display, and handle data efficiently.
sessions.description: Walk through integrating APIs, handling asynchronous operations, error handling, and setting up data fetching patterns in your app.

sessions.title: React with TypeScript: Type Your Code
